title: Primal Lust
description: From USA Today best-selling author, Willow Winters, comes a tempting tale of fated love, lust-filled secrets and the beginnings of an epic war. Never in my life could I have prepared for what fate had in store for me. Or for any of us.Our tales are intertwined and destiny saw fit to give me to a beast of a man who would die for me. He longs for me and I for him, but my past is riddled with a darkness and our present with deception and the whispers of war.Everything warns me that my life will change forever. That the world will crumble and burn. I donâ€™t know what will happen or what will become of us. All I know is that, in his eyes, I belong to him.This is book 3 of the To Be Claimed Saga. Wounded Kiss is book 1 and should be read first.
author: Willow Winters
